fees_page.title: Platform Tiers & Fees
fees_page.intro: Our system is designed to reward participation and long-term commitment through Account Tiers, XP, and a dynamic fee structure.
fees_page.tiers_subtitle: Your Account Tier is determined by your total XP. Higher tiers unlock significant benefits on select vaults.
fees_page.tier2_benefit: -2% Deposit Fee Discount on Core Vault
fees_page.tier3_benefit: -4% Deposit Fee Discount on Core Vault
fees_page.fees_subtitle: Each vault has a unique fee structure tailored to its strategy. Fees are split between platform operations, liquidity provision, and future development.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: 20% (Reduces with Tier). The full fee amount is credited to your Bonus Points balance.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_2: Performance Fee: Flat 20% charged only on generated profits.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_3: Lock-in Period: 1 month on all new capital allocated.
fees_page.ape_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: Flat 10% (Not affected by Tier). Credited as Bonus Points.
fees_page.ape_vault_desc_2: Performance Fee: 40% (Reduces with Tier). This fee is reduced by 2,5% for every additional Tier.
fees_page.xp_subtitle: XP is your measure of contribution to the ecosystem. See your rank on the <1>XP Leaderboard</1>.
fees_page.xp_rule_1_desc: Earn 1 XP for every $10 of capital allocated to any vault.
fees_page.xp_rule_2_desc: Earn daily XP based on the amount of capital you have active in vaults.
fees_page.xp_rule_3_desc: Earn bonus XP when a user you refer makes their first capital allocation.
fees_page.xp_rule_4_desc: Earn 1 XP for every 10 Bonus Points the platform buys back from you.

xp_leaderboard.title: XP & Leaderboard
xp_leaderboard.subtitle: Earn XP by participating in the ecosystem and climb the ranks!
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_signup: A one-time XP bonus is awarded to the first 500 users upon registration to reward our earliest supporters. The bonus is tiered:
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_allocation: You earn XP by putting your capital to work. For every $10 you allocate to any vault (minimum $100 allocation), you will earn 1 XP. An allocation of $1,000 earns you 100 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_referral: Whenever a user signs up with your referral code and makes a vault allocation (minimum $100), you, the referrer, will earn XP equal to 10% of their allocated amount EVERY TIME. If they allocate $1,000, you get 100 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_staking: A future feature will reward users with XP for every week they keep their capital allocated in a vault, rewarding long-term commitment.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_buyback: When the platform buys back your Bonus Points, you will receive XP equal to 10% of the value. A buy-back of 200 Bonus Points grants you 20 XP.

add_to_home_screen.subtitle: For the best experience, add our app to your home screen.
add_to_home_screen.step2: 2. Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen".

By purchasing or interacting with our services, you agree that you are not purchasing a security or investment and you agree to hold the team harmless and not liable for any losses or taxes you may incur.
legal.disclaimer3: Trading and investing in digital assets is highly speculative and comes with many risks. The analysis / stats on the website are for informational purposes and should not be treated as investment advice.
legal.rights: All rights reserved. The content and works published on this website are governed by the copyright laws of the operating jurisdiction.

faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.q1_answer: Bonus Points are our way of rewarding users who allocate capital to our vaults. When you allocate funds to a vault, a portion of that capital is converted into Bonus Points, valued at a 1:1 ratio with USDC. This helps cover the platform's operational and development costs, allowing us to build a better service for you.
faq_page.q2_title: Can I withdraw my Bonus Points?
faq_page.q2_answer: Bonus Points are not directly withdrawable. They represent your contribution to the platform. Over time, as our platform generates revenue from performance fees, we will use a portion of that revenue to "buy back" Bonus Points from users. This process converts your Bonus Points back into USDC, which is then added to your main "Available to Allocate" balance.
faq_page.q3_answer: When you request a withdrawal from a vault, a request is created to move your "Tradable Capital" back to your main "Available to Allocate" balance. This process can take a minimum of 48 hours to complete. To withdraw funds from the platform to an external wallet, you must use the "Withdraw Funds" feature on the Wallet page after your vault withdrawal has been processed.
